About Tizcóret

Tizcóret is designed to help you remember the moments that matter.
It provides simple, reliable reminders for Shabbat candle lighting and Yahrzeit dates.

The app focuses on clarity, accuracy, and ease of use.
No clutter, no distractions — just the tools you need to stay connected to tradition and memory.

Tizcóret is built with care and respect for the values it supports.
Thank you for using it and being part of its journey.
